article_title: Turkey Trot tradition marks its 27th year
article_text:

og.description: On the cold, sleepy Thanksgiving morning, walkers, joggers and runners scooted downhill to the Turkey Trot starting line, where Kenny Loggins’ “Footloose” bumped from loudspeakers.
